text:
Im having trouble creating pages. I keep getting this page up. I have toggled the "helper" off.
Even better, is there a way of resetting the whole webpage to scratch?
Instead of clicking "start setting up" you can click create, once you have a test page setup then you won't see this prompt anymore

I need to dump out a variable for a Quote template to see that data structure. The issue is this template is live and I don’t want clients seeing this data. But I need to test this on a live quote. Is there a staging area for any code changes I make?

You could use a query parameter.

add `?staging=true`  to the url

and on your template

```{% if request.query_dict.staging == 'true' %}
code here
{% endif %}```
Never used this on a quote template. So not 100% sure it'll work
Thanks <@UATE4ATHP> I’ll give that a try
